Module nl.naturalis.common

Package nl.naturalis.common

package nl.naturalis.common
Contains various static method utility classes for working with strings, arrays, collections, etc.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    nl.naturalis.common.collection
    Classes extending the functionality of the Java Collection framework.
    nl.naturalis.common.exception
    Classes related to exception handling.
    nl.naturalis.common.function
    Classes and interfaces related to functional programming.
    nl.naturalis.common.invoke
    Provides a bean reader and bean writer based on method handles and a minimal amount of reflection.
    nl.naturalis.common.path
    Classes related to following a path to the object or resource denoted by it.
    nl.naturalis.common.util
    Miscellaneious utility classes.
